Blog.post: He lives in NY and she lives in Pittsburg. Jenna Morasca and Ehan Zohn announced on the Survivor All-Stars finale that they are indeed dating. Ethan, the 30 year old pro soccer player and winner of Survivor: Africa, and Jenna Morasca, the 23 year old former swimsuit model and winner of Survivor: The Amazon, have 2 million dollars between them but they also have each other's hearts.
urlLink My Private Thoughts On Ethan and Jenna's relationship. I won't be posting very much in this blog because Ethan and Jenna have a very private relationship. :)

Hello and welcome, This blog spot is to celebrate Ethan Zohn, a 30 year old pro soccer player from Lexington, MA. It is important to note that I do not know Ethan personally and and, as much as I wish I did know them, I do not know the Zohn family personally either, so I can't get autographs for anyone no matter how much people cuss me out or how much grinding and gnashing of teeth people do. I would like people to keep in mind of this. Ethan Zohn was the million dollar winner of Survivor: Africa. He beat out Kim Johson, a retired school teacher from N.Y., for the million dollar prize Kim Johnson won the two hundred and fifty thousand dollar booby prize for coming in second place. Ethan is making it known to millions in his adoring public that he and Jenna Morasca, the 22 year old swimsuit model and Survivor: The Amazon winner from Pittsburg, PA, are indeed dating and that's all I can say about since I don't know much else about it and the couple have said nothing else about it. I would like to stress that this blog is a rumor free zone so I don't want to see any gossip or rumors about whether or not Ethan and Jenna are more than just friends.

Hello my fellow Survivor Fans, Early next year I hope to be on the Sail to Survive cruise with Ethan Zohn and Jenna Morasca. I hope to purchase two Survivor buffs for a charity auction. A yellow buff which represents the Saboga Tribe consisting of Jenna Lewis, Rudy Boesch, Rupert Boneham, Tina Wesson and Ethan Zohn and a green buff which represents the Mogo Mogo tribe consisting of Lex van den Burghe, Jenna Morasca, Richard Hatch, Colby Donaldson, Kathy Vavick-O'brien, and Shii Ann Huang with monies going to Ethan and Jenna's favourite charities. :)

urlLink SAIL TO SURVIVE Ethan and Jenna Morasca put together a cruise for early next year. Fund raised by this cruise will go to several charities that are near and dear to Ethan and Jenna's heart. These charities include: A.I.D.S. education in africa. Breast Cancer research. Colon Cancer research. A Pittsburg area No-Kill Animal shelter. Please come out and support Jenna and Ethan and their causes. :)
